HomeDescTour: Access to tutorials + latest news (news, bugs...). Byclicking on the arrow, another page opens. To exit this assistant mode, just click outside this window.
AddContentDescTour: Displays the AI functions catalog sorted by field/subfield and category/subcategory to create the desired content.
ContentsDescTour: Displays all the contents generated by the author using the agents. It is possible to sort them, filter them, consult the details, rename them, delete them...
CatalogSharedDescTour: List of AI functions available by default. They are sorted via tabs by field/subfield or category/subcategory
CatalogPersonalDescTour: These templates have been added from the default templates to be adapted. It is then possible to modify all information, from the name of the AI function to its sorting information or the prompts.
